PTUTokenBar.CombatTurnMovementLimited: Movement is set to combat turn, it's currently not your turn
PTUTokenBar.RequestNoneActorSelected: Cannot send request if no actors selected
PTUTokenBar.RequestNoneTokenSelected: Cannot send request if no tokens selected
PTUTokenBar.RequestActorMissing: Cannot send request if either actor is missing
PTUTokenBar.TokenNoActorAttrs: token has no actor to use for additional attributes
PTUTokenBar.ActorNoRollFunction: : Could not find function to roll
PTUTokenBar.notify-on-change.name: Notify on Movement Change
PTUTokenBar.notify-on-change.hint: Send a notification to all players when the GM changes the allowable movement
PTUTokenBar.show-xp-dialog.name: Show XP Dialog
PTUTokenBar.show-xp-dialog.hint: Show the XP Dialog automatically after you complete an encounter
PTUTokenBar.divide-xp.name: Divide XP among player
PTUTokenBar.divide-xp.hint: In the assign XP dialog, automatically divide the xp amongst the players
PTUTokenBar.show-resource-bars.name: Show Resource Bars
PTUTokenBar.token-pictures.name: Token Pictures
PTUTokenBar.token-pictures.hint: Choose to use the token image or the actors portrait image on the tokenbar
PTUTokenBar.allow-player.name: Allow Player to use
PTUTokenBar.allow-player.hint: Allow the player to use the toolbar, restricted to characters they own.
PTUTokenBar.disable-tokenbar.name: Disable Tokenbar
PTUTokenBar.disable-tokenbar.hint: If you don't wish to see the tokenbar, click this setting
PTUTokenBar.stat1-icon.name: Stat1 Icon
PTUTokenBar.stat1-icon.hint: Change the icon to display for the first stat.
PTUTokenBar.stat1-resource.name: Stat1 Resource
PTUTokenBar.stat1-resource.hint: Change the resource displayed by the first stat
PTUTokenBar.stat2-icon.name: Stat2 Icon
PTUTokenBar.stat2-icon.hint: Change the icon to display for the second stat.
PTUTokenBar.stat2-resource.name: Stat2 Resource
PTUTokenBar.stat2-resource.hint: Change the resource displayed by the second stat
PTUTokenBar.movement-after-combat.name: Set movement after combat
PTUTokenBar.movement-after-combat.hint: When combat ends, select what movement type to set it back to
PTUTokenBar.change-to-combat.name: Change movement to combat
PTUTokenBar.change-to-combat.hint: Change movement to combat when combat starts
PTUTokenBar.assign-loot.name: Convert enemies to lootable
PTUTokenBar.assign-loot.hint: Only works with the Loot Sheet module, but once the combat is over, convert the fallen enemies to lootable
PTUTokenBar.popout-tokenbar.name: Popout TokenBar
PTUTokenBar.popout-tokenbar.hint: Put the TokenBar in a dialog window so that you can use the PopOut! module.
PTUTokenBar.delete-after-grab.name: Delete message after grab
PTUTokenBar.delete-after-grab.hint: Delete the message after grabbing a players message roll for a requested roll.
PTUTokenBar.show-lootable-menu.name: Show Lootable Menu
PTUTokenBar.show-lootable-menu.hint: Show lootable button on the token menu
PTUTokenBar.request-roll-sound.name: Request Roll Sound
PTUTokenBar.request-roll-sound.hint: Play a sound when requesting a roll
